    • Creating long daily series
    • intro

Get approximate daily series over a large window

Source: R/ts_gtrends_windows.R
ts_gtrends_windows.Rd

This function downloads

ts_gtrends_windows(
  keyword = NA,
  category = "0",
  geo = "CH",
  from = "2019-01-01",
  prevent_window_shrinkage = FALSE,
  stepsize = 7,
  windowsize = 80,
  n_windows = 12,
  quiet = FALSE,
  wait = 60,
  retry = 5
)

Arguments

keyword

keyword(s) to compare
category

category/ies to compare
geo

region to get trends for
from

start of timeframe in YYYY-mm-dd form
stepsize

how far to advance the window in days
quiet

should progress output be su
wait

waiting time until retry
to

end of timeframe in YYYY-mm-dd form
